subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Since losing to the Indianapolis Colts in the first start by Donovan McNabb’s replacement, Jeff Garcia, the Eagles have won two consecutive games, and they believe Garcia gives them a chance to make the playoffs.
snippet: Since losing to the Indianapolis Colts in the first start by Donovan McNabb’s replacement, Jeff Garcia, the Eagles have won two consecutive games, and they believe Garcia gives them a chance to make the playoffs.
